TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit CultureInfo extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.IFormatProvider
Public Class CultureInfo Implements ICloneable, IFormatProvider
public ref class CultureInfo : ICloneable, IFormatProvider
type CultureInfo = class interface ICloneable interface IFormatProvider

summary.span: 提供有关特定区域性（对于非托管代码开发，则称为“区域设置”）的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture (called a *locale* for unmanaged code development).

summary.span: 这些信息包括区域性的名称、书写系统、使用的日历、字符串的排序顺序以及对日期和数字的格式化设置。

span.span: The information includes the names for the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, the sort order of strings, and formatting for dates and numbers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供特定于区域性的信息，如语言、 子语言、 国家/地区、 日历和与特定区域性关联的约定。The class provides culture-specific information, such as the language, sublanguage, country/region, calendar, and conventions associated with a particular culture. 此类还提供对特定于区域性的实例的访问， ， ，和对象。This class also provides access to culture-specific instances of the , , , and objects. 这些对象包含特定于区域性的操作，如大小写、 格式化日期和数字，并比较字符串所需的信息。These objects contain the information required for culture-specific operations, such as casing, formatting dates and numbers, and comparing strings. 类由直接或间接类设置的格式、 分析，或处理特定于区域性的数据，如， ， ，与数值类型。The class is used either directly or indirectly by classes that format, parse, or manipulate culture-specific data, such as , , , and the numeric types. 本节内容：In this section: [区域性名称和标识符](#CultureNames) [Culture names and identifiers](#CultureNames) [不变、 中立和特定区域性](#Invariant) [Invariant, neutral, and specific cultures](#Invariant) [自定义区域性](#Custom) [Custom cultures](#Custom) [动态区域性数据](#Dynamic) [Dynamic culture data](#Dynamic) [当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性](#Current) [The current culture and current UI culture](#Current) [获取所有区域性](#GetAll) [Getting all cultures](#GetAll) [区域性和线程](#Threads) [Culture and threads](#Threads) [区域性和应用程序域](#AppDomain) [Culture and application domains](#AppDomain) [区域性和基于任务的异步操作](#Async) [Culture and task-based asynchronous operations](#Async) [CultureInfo 对象序列化](#Serialization) [CultureInfo object serialization](#Serialization) [控件面板重写](#CPanel) [Control Panel overrides](#CPanel) [替代排序顺序](#AlternateSort) [Alternate sort orders](#AlternateSort) [区域性和 Windows 应用Culture and Windows apps](#Windows) ## 区域性名称和标识符Culture names and identifiers 类指定为每个区域性，基于 RFC 4646 的唯一名称。The class specifies a unique name for each culture, based on RFC 4646. 名称是与语言相关的 ISO 639 双小写字母的区域性代码和与国家或地区相关的 ISO 3166 双字母的大写字母子区域性代码的组合。The name is a combination of an ISO 639 two-letter lowercase culture code associated with a language and an ISO 3166 two-letter uppercase subculture code associated with a country or region. 此外，对于面向应用[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或更高版本并在 Windows 10 或更高版本，对应于有效的 BCP-47 语言标记受支持的区域性名称运行。In addition, for apps that target [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later and are running under Windows 10 or later, culture names that correspond to valid BCP-47 language tags are supported. > [!NOTE] > 当区域性名称传递给类构造函数或方法诸如或，其大小写并不重要。When a culture name is passed to a class constructor or a method such as or , its case is not significant. 根据 RFC 4646 的区域性名称的格式是*languagecode2*>-*country/regioncode2*，其中*languagecode2*是两个字母的语言代码并*country/regioncode2*是两个字母子区域性代码。The format for the culture name based on RFC 4646 is *languagecode2*>-*country/regioncode2*, where *languagecode2* is the two-letter language code and *country/regioncode2* is the two-letter subculture code. 示例包括 JA-JP 日语 （日本） 和美国英语 （美国）。Examples include ja-JP for Japanese (Japan) and en-US for English (United States). 在两个字母的语言代码不可用的情况下，使用派生自 ISO 639-2 的三个字母代码。In cases where a two-letter language code is not available, a three-letter code derived from ISO 639-2 is used. 请注意，某些区域性名称还指定 ISO 15924 书写符号。Note that some culture names also specify an ISO 15924 script. 例如，符号指定西里尔语脚本和 Latn 指定拉丁语脚本。For example, Cyrl specifies the Cyrillic script and Latn specifies the Latin script. 包含的脚本的区域性名称使用模式*languagecode2*-*scripttag*-*country/regioncode2*。A culture name that includes a script uses the pattern *languagecode2*-*scripttag*-*country/regioncode2*. 这种类型的区域性名称的一个示例是 uz 符号-UZ 为乌兹别克语 （西里尔文，乌兹别克斯坦）。An example of this type of culture name is uz-Cyrl-UZ for Uzbek (Cyrillic, Uzbekistan). 在 Windows Vista 之前的 Windows 操作系统，包括脚本的区域性名称使用模式*languagecode2*-*country/regioncode2* - *scripttag*，例如，uz UZ-符号的乌兹别克语 （西里尔文，乌兹别克斯坦）。On Windows operating systems before Windows Vista, a culture name that includes a script uses the pattern *languagecode2*-*country/regioncode2*-*scripttag*, for example, uz-UZ-Cyrl for Uzbek (Cyrillic, Uzbekistan). 只有两个字母的小写字母语言代码指定一个非特定区域性。A neutral culture is specified by only the two-letter lowercase language code. 例如，fr 为法语，指定的非特定区域性，de 代表德语指定非特定区域性。For example, fr specifies the neutral culture for French, and de specifies the neutral culture for German. > [!NOTE] > 有两个区域性名称不符合此规则。There are two culture names that contradict this rule. 区域性中文 （简体）-Zh-hans，名为和中文 （繁体），名为 Zh-hant，是非特定区域性。The cultures Chinese (Simplified), named zh-Hans, and Chinese (Traditional), named zh-Hant, are neutral cultures. 区域性名称表示当前的标准，并且应使用，除非使用旧名称 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 的理由需要。The culture names represent the current standard and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names zh-CHS and zh-CHT. 区域性标识符是标准的国际号码缩写，具有唯一标识的已安装的区域性之一的所需的组件。A culture identifier is a standard international numeric abbreviation and has the components necessary to uniquely identify one of the installed cultures. 你的应用程序可以使用预定义的区域性标识符，或定义自定义的标识符。Your application can use predefined culture identifiers or define custom identifiers. 某些预定义的区域性名称和标识符使用的此类和中的其他类命名空间。Certain predefined culture names and identifiers are used by this and other classes in the namespace. 详细的区域性信息将出现在[国家/地区语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在访问全球开发人员中心。Detailed culture information appears in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 请记住的区域性名称和标识符表示可在特定计算机找到的区域性的一个子集。Remember that the culture names and identifiers represent only a subset of cultures that can be found on a particular computer. Windows 版本或 service pack 可以更改的可用区域性。Windows versions or service packs can change the available cultures. 应用程序添加自定义区域性使用类。Applications add custom cultures using the class. 用户将添加使用 Microsoft Locale Builder 工具自己自定义区域性。Users add their own custom cultures using the Microsoft Locale Builder tool. Microsoft Locale Builder 编写在托管的代码中使用`CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder`类。Microsoft Locale Builder is written in managed code using the `CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder` class. 多个不同的名称是一种文化，值得注意的是与以下的类成员关联的名称与紧密关联：Several distinct names are closely associated with a culture, notably the names associated with the following class members: - - - ## 不变、 中立和特定区域性Invariant, neutral, and specific cultures 区域性通常分为三个集合： 固定区域性、 非特定区域性和特定区域性。The cultures are generally grouped into three sets: invariant cultures, neutral cultures, and specific cultures. 固定区域性是不区分区域性的。An invariant culture is culture-insensitive. 你的应用程序指定固定区域性的名称使用空字符串 ("") 或由其标识符。Your application specifies the invariant culture by name using an empty string ("") or by its identifier. 定义固定区域性的实例。 defines an instance of the invariant culture. 它是关联与英语语言，但不能与任何国家/地区。It is associated with the English language but not with any country/region. 几乎所有方法中使用`Globalization`要求区域性的命名空间。It is used in almost any method in the `Globalization` namespace that requires a culture. 非特定区域性是关联的区域性与一种语言，但不能与国家/地区。A neutral culture is a culture that is associated with a language but not with a country/region. 特定区域性是一个区域性与一种语言和国家/地区相关联。A specific culture is a culture that is associated with a language and a country/region. 例如，fr 是法语区域的非特定语言名称和 FR-FR 是特定的法语 （法国） 区域性的名称。For example, fr is the neutral name for the French culture, and fr-FR is the name of the specific French (France) culture. 请注意，中文 （简体） 和中文 （繁体） 也被视为非特定区域性。Note that Chinese (Simplified) and Chinese (Traditional) are also considered neutral cultures. 创建实例的类不建议一个非特定区域性，因为其包含的数据是任意的。Creating an instance of a class for a neutral culture is not recommended because the data it contains is arbitrary. 若要显示和对数据进行排序，指定的语言和区域。To display and sort data, specify both the language and region. 此外，属性的对象创建一个非特定区域性返回仅的国家/地区，并且不包含区域。Additionally, the property of a object created for a neutral culture returns only the country and does not include the region. 定义的区域性具有层次结构中的特定区域性的父级是一个非特定区域性和非特定区域性的父级是固定的区域性。The defined cultures have a hierarchy in which the parent of a specific culture is a neutral culture and the parent of a neutral culture is the invariant culture. 属性包含与特定区域性关联的非特定区域性。The property contains the neutral culture associated with a specific culture. 自定义区域性应为了符合此模式的属性。Custom cultures should define the property in conformance with this pattern. 如果针对特定区域性资源不可用在操作系统中，将使用关联的非特定区域性的资源。If the resources for a specific culture are not available in the operating system, the resources for the associated neutral culture are used. 如果非特定区域性资源不可用，则使用嵌入在主程序集中的资源。If the resources for the neutral culture are not available, the resources embedded in the main assembly are used. 资源回退进程的详细信息，请参阅[打包和部署资源](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)。For more information on the resource fallback process, see [Packaging and Deploying Resources](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md). Windows API 中的区域设置的列表是略有不同的.NET Framework 支持的区域性列表。The list of locales in the Windows API is slightly different from the list of cultures supported by the .NET Framework. 如果需要与 Windows 互操作性，例如，通过 p/invoke 机制，应用程序应使用特定区域性定义的操作系统。If interoperability with Windows is required, for example, through the p/invoke mechanism, the application should use a specific culture that is defined for the operating system. 使用特定区域性可确保与等效的 Windows 区域设置，会使用相同的区域设置标识符来标识的一致性。Use of the specific culture ensures consistency with the equivalent Windows locale, which is identified with a locale identifier that is the same as . 一个或可以创建仅用于固定区域性或特定区域性，不能为非特定区域性。A or a can be created only for the invariant culture or for specific cultures, not for neutral cultures. 如果是但未设置为 ZH-TW，然后， ，并返回空字符串 ("")。If is the but the is not set to zh-TW, then , , and return an empty string (""). ## 自定义区域性Custom cultures 除了 Windows 操作系统和.NET Framework 支持的预定义区域性，.NET Framework 支持三种类型的自定义区域性：In addition to the predefined cultures supported by the Windows operating system and the .NET Framework, the .NET Framework supports three types of custom cultures: - 新补充 Windows 或.NET Framework 中可用的区域性的区域性。New cultures that supplement the cultures available in Windows or the .NET Framework. 例如，应用程序无法安装表示 FJ-FJ （或 Fijan （斐济）） 区域性的系统上的对象。For example, an application could install a object that represents the fj-FJ (or Fijan (Fiji)) culture on a system. - 其属性是不同于 Windows 和.NET Framework 支持标准区域性的属性的替换区域性。Replacement cultures whose properties are different from the properties of the standard cultures supported by Windows and the .NET Framework. - 通过用户重写的标准区域性。Standard cultures with user overrides. 用户可以使用**区域和语言**应用程序中**控制面板**自定义现有区域性的属性值。The user can use the **Region and Language** application in **Control Panel** to customize an existing culture's property values. > [!NOTE] > 可以使用类来定义、 保存和注册自定义区域性的补充或替换现有的区域性。You can use the class to define, save, and register custom cultures that either supplement or replace existing cultures. 方法将创建可用于在目标系统上安装自定义区域性的区域设置数据标记语言 (LDML) 文件。The method creates a Locale Data Markup Language (LDML) file that can be used to install a custom culture on target systems. 有关分步步骤使用信息要创建一个新类或替换区域性，请参阅类主题。For step-by step information on using the class to create a new or replacement culture, see the class topic. 由于.NET Framework 支持自定义区域性，使用特定于区域性的数据时应考虑以下：Because the .NET Framework supports custom cultures, you should consider the following when working with culture-specific data: - 自定义区域性可以有超过预定义的区域性的范围的值。Custom cultures can have values that exceed the ranges of the predefined cultures. 例如，某些区域性具有非常长月份名称、 意外的日期或时间格式或其他不常见的数据。For example, some cultures have unusually long month names, unexpected date or time formats, or other unusual data. - 当在用户界面中显示特定于区域性的数据时，应遵守用户的自定义项;例如，用户可能希望采用 24 小时制或 yyyyMMdd 日期格式。When you display culture-specific data in the user interface, you should respect the user's customizations; for example, the user might want a 24-hour clock or a yyyyMMdd date format. - 请记住，自定义区域性重写默认值。Remember that custom cultures override default values. 因此，不能考虑区域性数据保持不变。Therefore, you cannot consider culture data to be stable. 在将来可能会更改国家/地区名称、 数字和日期格式和拼写。Country names, number and date formats, and spellings may change in the future. 如果你想要序列化区分区域性的数据，如要传递到的日期和时间分析函数的日期和时间字符串，应使用固定区域性或特定。If you want to serialize culture-sensitive data such as date and time strings to be passed to the date and time parsing functions, you should use the invariant culture or a specific . 的系统上安装的自定义区域性的属性值包含分配标志和自定义区域性属性值为`LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED`（0x1000 控制或 4096）。The property value of custom cultures installed on a system includes the flag, and custom cultures are assigned an property value of `LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED` (0x1000, or 4096). 请注意，从 Windows 10 开始，此值也分配给缺少完整的文化数据的系统定义的区域性。Note that, starting with Windows 10, this value is also assigned to system-defined cultures that lack complete cultural data. ## 动态区域性数据Dynamic culture data 固定区域性，除区域性数据是动态的。Except for the invariant culture, culture data is dynamic. 这是即使对于预定义的区域性，则返回 true。This is true even for the predefined cultures. 例如，国家或地区采用新的货币、 更改其拼写的单词，或更改其首选的日历和区域性定义更改跟踪此事件。For example, countries or regions adopt new currencies, change their spellings of words, or change their preferred calendar, and culture definitions change to track this. 自定义区域性可能会有所变动，恕不另行通知，和任何特定区域性可能会被重写通过自定义替换区域性。Custom cultures are subject to change without notice, and any specific culture might be overridden by a custom replacement culture. 此外，按如下所述，为单个用户可以重写区域首选项。Also, as discussed below, an individual user can override cultural preferences. 应用程序应始终在运行时获取区域性的数据。Applications should always obtain culture data at run time. > [!CAUTION] > 保存数据时，应用程序应使用固定区域性、 二进制格式或特定于区域性的格式。When saving data, your application should use the invariant culture, a binary format, or a specific culture-independent format. 根据特定区域性，而非固定区域性，与关联的当前值保存数据可能会变得不可读，或如果该区域性发生更改的含义可能会更改。Data saved according to the current values associated with a particular culture, other than the invariant culture, might become unreadable or might change in meaning if that culture changes. ## 当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性The current culture and current UI culture 在.NET Framework 应用程序中的每个线程都具有当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性。Every thread in a .NET Framework application has a current culture and a current UI culture. 当前区域性的日期、 时间、 数字和货币值、 文本、 大小写约定和比较字符串的方法的排序顺序确定的格式设置约定。The current culture determines the formatting conventions for dates, times, numbers, and currency values, the sort order of text, casing conventions, and the ways in which strings are compared. 当前 UI 区域性用于检索在运行时特定于区域性的资源。The current UI culture is used to retrieve culture-specific resources at runtime. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何针对每个线程确定当前和当前 UI 区域性的信息，请参阅[区域性和线程](#Threads)部分。For information on how the current and current UI culture is determined on a per-thread basis, see the [Culture and threads](#Threads) section. 了解如何将当前和当前 UI 区域性确定线程上执行新的应用程序域，并跨应用程序域边界的线程上请参阅[区域性和应用程序域](#AppDomain)部分。For information on how the current and current UI culture is determined on threads executing in a new application domain, and on threads that cross application domain boundaries, see the [Culture and application domains](#AppDomain) section. 有关如何执行基于任务的异步操作的线程上确定当前的和当前的信息，请参阅[区域性和基于任务的异步操作](#Async)部分。For information on how the current and current is determined on threads performing task-based asynchronous operations, see the [Culture and task-based asynchronous operations](#Async) section. 有关详细的当前区域性的信息，请参阅属性主题。For more detailed information on the current culture, see the property topic. 有关详细的当前 UI 区域性的信息，请参阅属性主题。For more detailed information on the current UI culture, see the property topic. ### 检索当前和当前 UI 区域性Retrieving the current and current UI cultures 可以获取对象，表示当前区域性中通过两种方式：You can get a object that represents the current culture in either of two ways: - 通过检索的值属性。By retrieving the value of the property. - 通过检索的值[Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture]()属性。By retrieving the value of the [Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture]() property. 下面的示例检索这两个属性值，将其以显示它们相等，并显示当前区域性的名称进行比较。The following example retrieves both property values, compares them to show that they are equal, and displays the name of the current culture. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Globalization.CultureInfo/cs/CurrentUI1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Globalization.CultureInfo/vb/CurrentUI1.vb#2)] ### 设置当前和当前 UI 区域性Setting the current and current UI cultures 若要更改区域性和 UI 线程的区域性，请执行以下操作：To change the culture and UI culture of a thread, do the following: 1. 实例化对象，通过调用表示该区域性类构造函数并将其传递区域性的名称。Instantiate a object that represents that culture by calling a class constructor and passing it the name of the culture. 构造函数实例化反映用户的对象重写的新区域性是否与当前的 Windows 区域性相同。The constructor instantiates a object that reflects user overrides if the new culture is the same as the current Windows culture. 构造函数允许您指定是否新实例化对象反映用户替代新区域性是否与当前的 Windows 区域性相同。The constructor allows you to specify whether the newly instantiated object reflects user overrides if the new culture is the same as the current Windows culture. 2. 将分配对象传递给或属性。Assign the object to the or property. 此外，对于版本 4.6 或更高版本的桌面.NET Framework 上运行的应用程序，你还可以分配对象传递给或属性。In addition, for apps running on the version 4.6 or later of the desktop .NET Framework, you can also assign the object to the or property. 下面的示例检索当前区域性。The following example retrieves the current culture. 如果是法语 （法国） 区域性之外的任何内容，但它会将当前区域性更改为法语 （法国）。If it is anything other than the French (France) culture, it changes the current culture to French (France). 否则，它将当前区域性更改为法语 （卢森堡）。Otherwise, it changes the current culture to French (Luxembourg). target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or later versions, culture is part of an asynchronous operation's context. current UI culture differs from the system culture, the current culture crosses thread boundaries and becomes the current culture of the thread pool thread that is executing an asynchronous operation. States). 然后它：It then: - 直接调用委托，以便使其在主应用线程上同步运行。Invokes the delegate directly so that it runs synchronously on the main app thread. - 创建线程池线程异步执行委托的任务。Creates a task that executes the delegate asynchronously on a thread pool thread. - 创建一个任务，该委托线程上同步执行主应用程序通过调用方法。Creates a task that executes the delegate synchronously on the main app thread by calling the method. 如示例输出所示，如果当前区域性更改为法语 （法国） 任务以异步方式调用从该线程的当前区域性将成为该异步操作的当前区域性。As the output from the example shows, when the current culture is changed to French (France), the current culture of the thread from which tasks are invoked 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分的当前区域性关联的值。The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用一种货币而不是默认区域性。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 一般情况下，您的应用程序应遵循这些用户重写。In general, your applications should honor these user overrides. 如果是`true`和指定的区域性匹配的 Windows，当前区域性使用这些重写值，其中包括用户设置的属性返回实例属性，和的属性返回实例属性。If is `true` and the specified culture matches the current culture of Windows, the uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the instance returned by the property, and the properties of the instance returned by the property. 如果用户设置与不兼容与关联的区域性，例如，如果在所选的日历不是之一，方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined. ## 替代排序顺序Alternate sort orders 一些文化可支持多个排序顺序。Some cultures support more than one sort order. 例如:For example: - 西班牙语 （西班牙） 区域性都有两种排序顺序： 默认国际排序顺序和传统的排序顺序。The Spanish (Spain) culture has two sort orders: the default international sort order, and the traditional sort order. 当您实例化对象 ES-ES 区域性名称，则使用国际排序顺序。When you instantiate a object with the es-ES culture name, the international sort order is used. 当您实例化对象具有 es ES tradnl 区域性名称，则使用传统的排序顺序。When you instantiate a object with the es-ES-tradnl culture name, the traditional sort order is used. - ZH-CN （中文 （简体，中国）） 区域性支持两种排序顺序： 按发音 （默认值） 和按笔画数。The zh-CN (Chinese (Simplified, PRC)) culture supports two sort orders: by pronunciation (the default) and by stroke count. 当您实例化对象 ZH-CN 区域性名称，则使用默认排序顺序。When you instantiate a object with the zh-CN culture name, the default sort order is used. 当您实例化对象 0x00020804 的本地标识符的字符串按笔画数排序。When you instantiate a object with a local identifier of 0x00020804, strings are sorted by stroke count. 下表列出了支持替代排序顺序和标识符的默认和替代排序顺序的区域性。The following table lists the cultures that support alternate sort orders and the identifiers for the default and alternate sort orders. |区域性名称Culture name|cultureCulture|默认排序名称和标识符Default sort name and identifier|替代排序名称和标识符Alternate sort name and identifier| |------------------|-------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |es-ESes-ES|西班牙语 （西班牙）Spanish (Spain)|国际： 0x00000C0AInternational: 0x00000C0A|传统： 0x0000040ATraditional: 0x0000040A| |zh-TWzh-TW|中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan)|笔画数： 0x00000404Stroke Count: 0x00000404|注音符号分类： 0x00030404Bopomofo: 0x00030404| |zh-CNzh-CN|中文 （中华人民共和国）Chinese (PRC)|发音： 0x00000804Pronunciation: 0x00000804|笔画数： 0x00020804Stroke Count: 0x00020804| |zh-HKzh-HK|中文 （中国香港特别行政区）Chinese (Hong Kong SAR)|笔画数： 0x00000c04Stroke Count: 0x00000c04|笔画数： 0x00020c04Stroke Count: 0x00020c04| |zh-SGzh-SG|中文 （新加坡）Chinese (Singapore)|发音： 0x00001004Pronunciation: 0x00001004|笔画数： 0x00021004Stroke Count: 0x00021004| |zh MOzh-MO|中文 （澳门特别行政区）Chinese (Macao SAR)|发音： 0x00001404Pronunciation: 0x00001404|笔画数： 0x00021404Stroke Count: 0x00021404| |ja-JPja-JP|日语 （日本）Japanese (Japan)|默认： 0x00000411Default: 0x00000411|Unicode: 0x00010411Unicode: 0x00010411| |ko-KRko-KR|朝鲜语 （韩国）Korean (Korea)|默认： 0x00000412Default: 0x00000412|朝鲜语 Xwansung-Unicode: 0x00010412Korean Xwansung - Unicode: 0x00010412| |de-DEde-DE|德语 （德国）German (Germany)|字典： 0x00000407Dictionary: 0x00000407|电话簿排序 DIN: 0x00010407Phone Book Sort DIN: 0x00010407| |hu HUhu-HU|匈牙利语 （匈牙利）Hungarian (Hungary)|默认： 0x0000040eDefault: 0x0000040e|技术排序： 0x0001040eTechnical Sort: 0x0001040e| |ka GEka-GE|格鲁吉亚语 （格鲁吉亚）Georgian (Georgia)|传统： 0x00000437Traditional: 0x00000437|现代排序： 0x00010437Modern Sort: 0x00010437| ## 当前区域性和 UWP 应用The current culture and UWP apps 在通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 应用中，和属性是读写的就像它们是.NET Framework 和.NET Core 应用程序中。In Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, the and properties are read-write, just as they are in .NET Framework and .NET Core apps. 但是，UWP 应用识别单个区域性。However, UWP apps recognize a single culture. 并属性映射到的第一个值[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)集合。The and properties map to the first value in the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) collection. 在.NET Framework 和.NET Core 应用程序，当前区域性为每个线程设置，并和属性反映了区域性和 UI 区域性的当前线程。In .NET Framework and .NET Core apps, the current culture is a per-thread setting, and the and properties reflect the culture and UI culture of the current thread only. 在 UWP 应用中，当前的区域性将映射到[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)回收，这是一种全局设置。In UWP apps, the current culture maps to the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) collection, which is a global setting. 设置或属性发生更改的整个应用程序的区域性; 不能针对每个线程设置区域性。Setting the or property changes the culture of the entire app; culture cannot be set on a per-thread basis. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建西班牙语 （西班牙） 与国际排序，另一个对象使用传统排序的对象。The following example shows how to create a object for Spanish (Spain) with the international sort and another object with the traditional sort. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中列出了预定义的区域性标识符[国家/地区语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在访问全球开发人员中心。Predefined culture identifiers are listed in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 在大多数情况下，`culture`参数映射到相应的国家/地区语言支持 (NLS) 区域设置标识符。In most cases, the `culture` parameter is mapped to the corresponding National Language Support (NLS) locale identifier. 值`culture`参数将成为的值的新属性。The value of the `culture` parameter becomes the value of the property of the new . 我们建议您调用的区域设置名称构造函数，因为区域设置名称要优于 Lcid。We recommend that you call the locale name constructor , because locale names are preferable to LCIDs. 对于自定义区域设置，区域设置名称是必需的。For custom locales, a locale name is required. 用户可以选择重写一些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分的当前区域性关联的值。The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用一种货币而不是默认区域性。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果指定的区域性标识符与当前的 Windows 区域性的区域性标识符相匹配，此构造函数创建使用这些重写，其中包括的属性的用户设置返回实例属性和属性的返回实例属性。If the specified culture identifier matches the culture identifier of the current Windows culture, this constructor creates a that uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the instance returned by the property, and the properties of the instance returned by the property. 如果用户设置与不兼容与关联的区域性(例如，如果在所选的日历不是之一) 方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the (for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the ) the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined. 如果指定的区域性标识符与当前的 Windows 区域性标识符不匹配，此构造函数创建，使用的默认值为指定的区域性。If the specified culture identifier does not match the identifier of the current Windows culture, this constructor creates a that uses the default values for the specified culture. 属性始终设置为`true`。The property is always set to `true`. 例如，假设阿拉伯语 （沙特阿拉伯） 系统的当前 Windows 区域性并且用户已为公历从回历更改日历。For example, suppose that Arabic (Saudi Arabia) is the current Windows culture and the user has changed the calendar from Hijri to Gregorian. - 与`CultureInfo("0x0401")`（区域性名称 ar SA），设置为（这是用户设置） 和设置为`true`。With `CultureInfo("0x0401")` (culture name ar-SA), is set to (which is the user setting) and is set to `true`. - 与`CultureInfo("0x041E")`（区域性名称 TH-TH），设置为（这是 TH-TH 的默认日历） 和设置为`true`。With `CultureInfo("0x041E")` (culture name th-TH), is set to (which is the default calendar for th-TH) and is set to `true`. 对于使用欧元的区域性，情况下，.NET Framework 和 Windows XP 设置的默认货币为欧元。For cultures that use the euro, the .NET Framework and Windows XP set the default currency as euro. 但是，较旧版本的 Windows 不这样做。However, older versions of Windows do not. 因此，如果将较旧版本的 Windows 用户未更改的货币设置通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分，货币可能不正确。Therefore, if the user of an older version of Windows has not changed the currency setting through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel, the currency might be incorrect. 若要使用的货币和.NET Framework 默认设置，该应用程序应使用构造函数重载接受`useUserOverride`参数并将其设置为`false`。To use the .NET Framework default setting for the currency, the application should use a constructor overload that accepts a `useUserOverride` parameter and set it to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 有关向后兼容性，构造使用的区域性`culture`0x0004 或 0x7c04 参数将具有ZH-CHS 或 ZH-CHT 属性分别。For backwards compatibility, a culture constructed using a `culture` parameter of 0x0004 or 0x7c04 will have a property of zh-CHS or zh-CHT, respectively. 应改为想要构造使用-Zh-hans 或此不同的当前标准区域性名称的区域性，除非已使用旧名称的原因。You should instead prefer to construct the culture using the current standard culture names of zh-Hans or zh-Hant, unless you have a reason for using the older names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预定义的区域性名称的列表，请参阅[国家/地区语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在访问全球开发人员中心。For a list of predefined culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，从 Windows 10 开始`name`可以是任何有效的 BCP-47 语言标记。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 如果`name`是，在构造函数创建固定区域性的一个实例; 这等效于检索的值属性。If `name` is , the constructor creates an instance of the invariant culture; this is equivalent to retrieving the value of the property. 用户可以选择重写一些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分的当前区域性关联的值。The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用一种货币而不是默认区域性。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果与关联的区域性标识符`name`匹配此构造函数的当前 Windows 区域性的区域性标识符创建对象，它使用这些重写值，其中包括用户设置的属性的返回的实例属性和属性的返回实例属性。If the culture identifier associated with `name` matches the culture identifier of the current Windows culture, this constructor creates a object that uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the instance returned by the property, and the properties of the instance returned by the property. 如果用户设置与不兼容与关联的区域性，例如，如果在所选的日历不是之一，方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined. 如果与关联的区域性标识符`name`不的匹配此构造函数的当前 Windows 区域性的区域性标识符创建使用的默认值为指定的区域性的对象。If the culture identifier associated with `name` does not match the culture identifier of the current Windows culture, this constructor creates a object that uses the default values for the specified culture. 属性始终设置为`true`。The property is always set to `true`. 例如，假设阿拉伯语 （沙特阿拉伯） 是 Windows 的当前区域性和用户可更改回历为公历日历。For example, suppose that Arabic (Saudi Arabia) is the current culture of Windows and the user changed the calendar from Hijri to Gregorian. - 与`CultureInfo("ar-SA")`，设置为（这是用户设置） 和设置为`true`。With `CultureInfo("ar-SA")`, is set to (which is the user setting) and is set to `true`. - 与`CultureInfo("th-TH")`，设置为（这是 TH-TH 的默认日历） 和设置为`true`。With `CultureInfo("th-TH")`, is set to (which is the default calendar for th-TH) and is set to `true`. 属性的新设置为与指定名称关联的区域性标识符。The property of the new is set to the culture identifier associated with the specified name. 对于使用欧元的区域性，情况下，.NET Framework 和 Windows XP 设置的默认货币为欧元。For cultures that use the euro, the .NET Framework and Windows XP set the default currency as euro. 但是，较旧版本的 Windows 不这样做。However, older versions of Windows do not do this. 因此，如果将较旧版本的 Windows 用户未更改的货币设置通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分，货币可能不正确。Therefore, if the user of an older version of Windows has not changed the currency setting through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel, the currency might be incorrect. 若要使用的货币和.NET Framework 默认设置，该应用程序应使用构造函数重载接受`useUserOverride`参数并将其设置为`false`。To use the .NET Framework default setting for the currency, the application should use a constructor overload that accepts a `useUserOverride` parameter and set it to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例检索当前区域性。The following example retrieves the current culture. 如果它不是法语 （法国） 区域性，则会调用构造函数实例化表示法语 （法国） 区域性，并使其成为当前线程区域性的对象。If it is anything other than the French (France) culture, it calls the constructor to instantiate a object that represents the French (France) culture and makes it the current thread culture. 否则，它实例化表示法语 （卢森堡） 区域性，并使其当前区域性的对象。Otherwise, it instantiates a object that represents the French (Luxembourg) culture and makes it the current culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 信息，例如默认区域性和格式模式，将缓存第一次请求。Information, such as the default culture and format patterns, is cached the first time it is requested. 信息可以更改的生命周期内，例如，当用户修改控制面板的区域和语言选项部分。That information can change during the life of the , for example, when the user modifies the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，类不会自动在系统设置中检测更改。However, the class does not automatically detect changes in the system settings. 方法将清除的缓存创建的对象，并刷新中的信息， ，并基于当前系统设置的属性。The method clears the cache of objects created by and refreshes the information in the , , and properties, based on the current system settings. 方法不会刷新中的信息现有线程的属性。The method does not refresh the information in the property for existing threads. 但是，未来的线程将使用任何新属性值。However, future threads will have any new property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 克隆是可写即使原始是只读的。The clone is writable even if the original is read-only. 因此，可以修改克隆的属性。Therefore, the properties of the clone can be modified. 一个对象的浅表副本是仅对象的副本。A shallow copy of an object is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，浅表副本不创建所引用对象的副本。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects. 它而是指原始对象。It refers to the original objects instead. 与此相反，对象的深层副本创建的对象的副本和所有内容直接或间接引用该对象的副本。In contrast, a deep copy of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 方法创建一个增强的浅表副本。The method creates an enhanced shallow copy. 返回的对象， ， ，和属性也会被复制。The objects returned by the , , , and properties are also copied. 因此，克隆对象可以修改其复制的属性，而不会影响原始对象。Consequently, the cloned object can modify its copied properties without affecting the original object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 CultureInfo.Clone 还克隆并与关联的实例。The following code example shows that CultureInfo.Clone also clones the and instances associated with the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法包装对的调用构造函数。The method wraps a call to the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 预定义的区域性名称的列表，请参阅[国家/地区语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在访问全球开发人员中心。For a list of predefined culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，从 Windows 10 开始`name`可以是任何有效的 BCP-47 语言标记。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 区域性分为三个集合： 固定区域性、 非特定区域性和特定区域性。Cultures are grouped into three sets: the invariant culture, the neutral cultures, and the specific cultures. 有关详细信息，请参阅的说明类。For more information, see the description of the class. 如果此方法返回的特定区域性的区域性标识符与当前的 Windows 区域性的区域性标识符相匹配，则此方法创建对象，它使用 Windows 区域性重写。If the culture identifier of the specific culture returned by this method matches the culture identifier of the current Windows culture, this method creates a object that uses the Windows culture overrides. 重写中包括的属性的用户设置返回的对象属性和返回的对象属性。The overrides include user settings for the properties of the object returned by the property and the object returned by the property. 若要实例化对象，默认值的区域性设置而不是用户重写时，调用构造函数，值为`false`为`useUserOverride`参数。To instantiate a object that with default culture settings rather than user overrides, call the constructor with a value of `false` for the `useUserOverride` argument. 尽管方法名称包括术语"特定"，请记住区域性数据可以更改之间的版本中，或由于自定义区域性，或由于用户重写。Although the method name includes the term "Specific", remember that culture data can change between versions, or due to custom cultures, or because of user overrides. 有关将数据保存使用固定区域性或二进制或固定的窗体。Use the invariant culture or binary or fixed forms for saving data. ## Examples 下面的示例检索的数组对象表示从非特定区域性方法并对数组进行排序。The following example retrieves an array of objects that represent neutral cultures from the method and sorts the array. 当它循环访问数组中的元素时，它将传递到每个非特定区域性的名称方法，并显示该方法所返回的特定区域性的名称。When it iterates the elements in the array, it passes the name of each neutral culture to the method and displays the name of the specific culture returned by the method. > [!NOTE] > 该示例使用 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 区域性名称。The example uses the zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names. 但是，面向 Windows Vista 和更高版本应该使用-Zh-hans 而不是 ZH-CHS 和 Zh-hant 而不是 ZH-CHT 的应用程序。However, applications that target Windows Vista and later should use zh-Hans instead of zh-CHS and zh-Hant instead of zh-CHT. -Zh-hans 和 Zh-hant 表示当前的标准，除非必须使用较旧名称的原因，否则应使用。zh-Hans and zh-Hant represent the current standard and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. > > 另请注意，示例的结果可能不同的输入中文 （繁体） 是非特定区域性 （zh、 ZH-CHT 或 Zh-hant） 将在其中返回 ZH-TW 的中国台湾 Windows 安装上。Note also that the results of the example may differ on an installation of Taiwanese Windows, where the input of a Chinese (Traditional) neutral culture (zh, zh-CHT, or zh-Hant) will return zh-TW. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture2/CS/createspecificculture2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture2/VB/createspecificculture2.vb#2)]

value.span: 表示当前线程使用的区域性的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the culture used by the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象及其关联的对象确定的日期的默认格式、 时间、 数字、 货币值，排序顺序的文本、 大小写约定，和的字符串比较。The object that is returned by this property and its associated objects determine the default format for dates, times, numbers, currency values, the sorting order of text, casing conventions, and string comparisons. 当前的区域性是执行线程，返回的静态属性属性。The current culture is a property of the executing thread, which is returned by the static property. 值属性的值对应属性。The value of the property corresponds to the value of the property. 检索的值属性相当于检索对象返回的`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture`属性。Retrieving the value of the property is equivalent to retrieving the object returned by the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，设置的值属性也会更改当前线程区域性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], setting the value of the property also changes the current thread culture. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及更早版本中，属性是只读的; 也就是说，可以检索属性值，但不能将其设置。In the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and earlier versions, the property is read-only; that is, you can retrieve the property value, but you cannot set it. 若要更改当前区域性，将分配对象，表示的新区域性`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture`属性。To change the current culture, you assign the object that represents the new culture to the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，则属性为读写; 可以同时设置和检索属性的值。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the property is read-write; you can both set and retrieve the property's value. 如果属性值设置对象，表示新区域性，则`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture`属性也会更改。If you do set the property value to a object that represents a new culture, the value of the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property also changes. 本节内容：In this section: [如何确定线程的区域性](#ThreadCulture) [How a Thread's Culture Is Determined](#ThreadCulture) [获取当前区域性](#Getting) [Getting the Current Culture](#Getting) [将 CurrentCulture 属性显式设置](#ExplicitSetting) [Explicitly Setting the CurrentCulture Property](#ExplicitSetting) [当前区域性和用户重写](#Overrides) [The Current Culture and User Overrides](#Overrides) [区域性和 Windows 应用Culture and Windows Apps](#WindowsAndCurr) ## 如何确定线程的区域性How a Thread's Culture Is Determined 在线程启动时，其区域性是最初确定的如下所示：When a thread is started, its culture is initially determined as follows: - 通过检索由指定的区域性线程执行所在，如果属性值不是在应用程序域的属性`null`。By retrieving the culture that is specified by the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing, if the property value is not `null`. - 如果线程执行基于任务的异步操作和应用面向一个线程池线程[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]或更高版本的.NET Framework 中，其区域性由调用线程的区域性。If the thread is a thread pool thread that is executing a task-based asynchronous operation and the app targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or a later version of the .NET Framework, its culture is determined by the culture of the calling thread. 下面的示例将当前区域性更改为葡萄牙语 （巴西），并启动六项任务，其中每个显示其线程 ID、 其任务 ID 和其当前区域性。The following example changes the current culture to Portuguese (Brazil) and launches six tasks, each of which displays its thread ID, its task ID, and its current culture. 每个任务 （和线程） 已继承调用线程的区域性。Each of the tasks (and the threads) has inherited the culture of the calling thread. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/cs/Async1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/vb/Async1.vb#14)] 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"区域性和基于任务的异步操作"部分主题。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. - 通过调用 Windows`GetUserDefaultLocaleName`函数。By calling the Windows `GetUserDefaultLocaleName` function. 请注意，如果设置不同于安装了系统的区域性或用户的首选的区域性的特定区域性并启动应用程序的多个线程，这些线程的当前区域性的区域性，返回的`GetUserDefaultLocaleName`函数，除非您为其分配区域性线程执行所在的应用程序域中的属性。Note that if you set a specific culture that is different from the system-installed culture or the user's preferred culture, and your application starts multiple threads, the current culture of those threads will be the culture that is returned by the `GetUserDefaultLocaleName` function, unless you assign a culture to the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing. 有关如何确定线程的区域性的详细信息，请参阅中的"区域性和线程"部分参考页。For more information about how the culture of a thread is determined, see the "Culture and threads" section in the reference page. ## 获取当前区域性Getting the Current Culture 属性是每个线程设置; 这就是，每个线程可以具有其自己的区域性。The property is a per-thread setting; that is, each thread can have its own culture. 检索的值来获取当前线程的区域性属性，如下面的示例说明了。You get the culture of the current thread by retrieving the value of the property, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/cs/Get1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/vb/Get1.vb#5)] 此外可以检索的值从当前线程的区域性属性。You can also retrieve the value of the current thread's culture from the property. ## 将 CurrentCulture 属性显式设置Explicitly Setting the CurrentCulture Property 着手[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，以更改由现有线程的区域性设置属性改为新的区域性。Staring with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], to change the culture that is used by an existing thread, you set the property to the new culture. 线程跨越应用程序域边界时，如果显式更改这种方式，更改线程的区域性仍然存在。If you explicitly change a thread's culture in this way, that change persists if the thread crosses application domain boundaries. 下面的示例将当前的线程区域性更改为荷兰语 （荷兰）。The following example changes the current thread culture to Dutch (Netherlands). 它还显示，如果当前线程跨越应用程序域边界，其当前区域性保持更改。It also shows that, when the current thread crosses application domain boundaries, its current culture remains changed. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/cs/changeculture11.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/vb/changeculture11.vb#11)] > [!NOTE] > 通过使用更改区域性属性需要权限值设置。Changing the culture by using the property requires a permission with the value set. 由于与线程关联的安全状态，对线程进行操作很危险。Manipulating threads is dangerous because of the security state associated with threads. 因此，仅对可信的代码，并且仅在必要的时候，则应授予此权限。Therefore, this permission should be given only to trustworthy code, and then only as necessary. 不能更改线程的区域性不完全受信任的代码中。You cannot change thread culture in semi-trusted code. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，可以显式更改当前线程区域性为特定区域性 （如法语 （加拿大）） 或非特定区域性 （如法语）。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], you can explicitly change the current thread culture to either a specific culture (such as French (Canada)) or a neutral culture (such as French). 当对象表示非特定区域性，值属性，如， ， ， ，和反映与之关联的特定区域性非特定区域性。When a object represents a neutral culture, the values of properties such as , , , , and reflect the specific culture that is associated with the neutral culture. 例如，英语的非特定区域性的主要区域性为英语 （美国）;正使用德语区域性的主要区域性是德语 （德国）。For example, the dominant culture for the English neutral culture is English (United States); the dominant culture for the German culture is German (Germany). 下面的示例演示在格式设置时的当前区域性设置为特定区域性、 法语 （加拿大） 和一个非特定区域性差异法语。The following example illustrates the difference in formatting when the current culture is set to a specific culture, French (Canada), and a neutral culture, French. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/cs/specific12.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/vb/specific12.vb#12)] 此外可以使用属性连同属性来设置属性的 ASP.NET 应用程序向用户首选区域性，如以下示例所示。You can also use the property along with the property to set the property of an ASP.NET application to the user's preferred culture, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/cs/aspculture13.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/vb/aspculture13.vb#13)] ## 当前区域性和用户重写The Current Culture and User Overrides Windows 允许用户重写的标准属性值对象，并使用其关联的对象**区域和语言选项**控制面板中。Windows allows users to override the standard property values of the object and its associated objects by using **Regional and Language Options** in Control Panel. 返回对象属性会反映出这些用户将在以下情况下重写：The object returned by the property reflects these user overrides in the following cases: - 如果当前线程区域性设置隐式的 Windows`GetUserDefaultLocaleName`函数。If the current thread culture is set implicitly by the Windows `GetUserDefaultLocaleName` function. - 如果当前线程区域性定义的属性对应于当前的 Windows 系统区域。If the current thread culture defined by the property corresponds to the current Windows system culture. - 如果当前线程区域性显式设置返回区域性方法和区域性对应于当前的 Windows 系统区域。If the current thread culture is set explicitly to a culture returned by the method, and that culture corresponds to the current Windows system culture. - 如果当前线程区域性显式设置为通过实例化一个区域性构造函数和区域性对应于当前的 Windows 系统区域。If the current thread culture is set explicitly to a culture instantiated by the constructor, and that culture corresponds to the current Windows system culture. 在某些情况下，特别是对于服务器应用程序，将当前区域性设置为反映用户重写的对象可能不需要。In some cases, particularly for server applications, setting the current culture to a object that reflects user overrides may be undesirable. 相反，可以将当前线程区域性设置为对象不会反映用户重写以下方面：Instead, you can set the current thread culture to a object that does not reflect user overrides in the following ways: - 通过调用构造函数，值为`false`为`useUserOverride`参数。By calling the constructor with a value of `false` for the `useUserOverride` argument. - 通过调用方法，它返回只读缓存，对象。By calling the method, which returns a cached, read-only object. ## 当前区域性和 UWP 应用The current culture and UWP apps 在通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 应用中，属性是读写的就像它是.NET Framework 和.NET Core 应用程序中; 您可以使用它来获取并设置当前区域性。In Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, the property is read-write, just as it is in .NET Framework and .NET Core apps; you can use it both to get and to set the current culture. 但是，UWP 应用不区分当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性。However, UWP apps do not distinguish between the current culture and the current UI culture. 并属性映射到的第一个值[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)集合。The and properties map to the first value in the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) collection. 在.NET Framework 和.NET Core 应用程序，当前区域性为每个线程设置，和属性反映当前线程的区域性。In .NET Framework and .NET Core apps, the current culture is a per-thread setting, and the property reflects the culture of the current thread only. 在 UWP 应用中，当前的区域性将映射到[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)属性，它是一种全局设置。In UWP apps, the current culture maps to the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) property, which is a global setting. 设置属性发生更改的整个应用程序的区域性; 不能针对每个线程设置区域性。Setting the property changes the culture of the entire app; culture cannot be set on a per-thread basis. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改和当前线程。The following example demonstrates how to change the and of the current thread. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2/CPP/currentculture.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2/CS/currentculture.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2/VB/currentculture.vb#11)]

span.span: The culture used by the Resource Manager to look up culture-specific resources at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前 UI 区域性为每个线程属性。The current UI culture is a per-thread property. 也就是说，每个线程都具有其自己当前 UI 区域性。That is, each thread has its own current UI culture. 此属性等效于检索，或开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，并设置分配给对象`System.Threading.Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture`属性。This property is equivalent to retrieving or, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], setting the object assigned to the `System.Threading.Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture` property. 在线程启动时，其 UI 区域性是最初确定的如下所示：When a thread is started, its UI culture is initially determined as follows: - 通过检索由指定的区域性线程执行所在，如果属性值不是在应用程序域的属性`null`。By retrieving the culture that is specified by the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing, if the property value is not `null`. - 如果线程执行基于任务的异步操作和应用面向一个线程池线程[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]或更高版本的.NET Framework 中，其 UI 区域性由调用线程的 UI 区域性。If the thread is a thread pool thread that is executing a task-based asynchronous operation and the app targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or a later version of the .NET Framework, its UI culture is determined by the UI culture of the calling thread. 下面的示例将当前 UI 区域性更改为葡萄牙语 （巴西），并启动六项任务，其中每个显示其线程 ID、 其任务 ID 和其当前 UI 区域性。The following example changes the current UI culture to Portuguese (Brazil) and launches six tasks, each of which displays its thread ID, its task ID, and its current UI culture. 每个任务 （和线程） 已继承调用线程的 UI 区域性。Each of the tasks (and the threads) has inherited the UI culture of the calling thread. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/cs/Async1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/vb/Async1.vb#14)] 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"区域性和基于任务的异步操作"部分主题。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. - 通过调用 Windows`GetUserDefaultUILanguage`函数。By calling the Windows `GetUserDefaultUILanguage` function. > [!NOTE] > 在中[!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)]，则属性是只读的。In the [!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)], the property is read-only. 当前 UI 区域性由系统的区域设置，并且不能以编程方式更改。The current UI culture is determined by the system's regional settings and cannot be changed programmatically. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，若要更改的用户界面区域性由一个线程，设置属性改为新的区域性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], to change the user interface culture used by a thread, set the property to the new culture. 线程跨越应用程序域边界时，如果您显式更改线程的 UI 区域性中更改这种方式仍然存在。If you explicitly change a thread's UI culture in this way, that change persists if the thread crosses application domain boundaries. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及更早版本中，属性是只读的; 也就是说，可以检索属性值，但不能将其设置。In the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and earlier versions, the property is read-only; that is, you can retrieve the property value, but you cannot set it. 若要更改当前 UI 区域性，将分配对象，表示到新的 UI 区域性`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture`属性。To change the current UI culture, you assign the object that represents the new UI culture to the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture` property. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，则属性为读写; 可以同时设置和检索属性的值。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the property is read-write; you can both set and retrieve the property's value. 如果属性值设置对象，表示新区域性，则`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture`属性也会更改。If you do set the property value to a object that represents a new culture, the value of the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property also changes. 本节内容：In this section: [获取当前 UI 区域性](#Getting) [Getting the Current UI Culture](#Getting) [显式设置当前 UI 区域性](#Explicit) [Explicitly Setting the Current UI Culture](#Explicit) [隐式设置当前 UI 区域性](#Implicit) [Implicitly Setting the Current UI Culture](#Implicit) [安全注意事项](#Security) [Security Considerations](#Security) [当前 UI 区域性和 Windows 应用程序The Current UI Culture and Windows apps](#WindowsAndCurrUI) ## 获取当前 UI 区域性Getting the Current UI Culture 属性是每个线程设置; 这就是，每个线程可以具有其自己的 UI 区域性。The property is a per-thread setting; that is, each thread can have its own UI culture. 检索的值来获取当前线程的 UI 区域性属性，如下面的示例说明了。You get the UI culture of the current thread by retrieving the value of the property, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/cs/Get1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/vb/Get1.vb#5)] 此外可以检索的值从当前线程的 UI 区域性属性。You can also retrieve the value of the current thread's UI culture from the property. ## 显式设置当前 UI 区域性Explicitly Setting the Current UI Culture 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，可以通过将分配更改当前 UI 区域性对象，表示的新区域性属性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], you can change the current UI culture by assigning a object that represents the new culture to the property. 可以设置当前 UI 区域性，为任一特定区域性设置 （如 EN-US 或 DE-DE） 或非特定区域性 （例如 en 或 de）。The current UI culture can be set to either a specific culture (such as en-US or de-DE) or to a neutral culture (such as en or de). 下面的示例将当前 UI 区域性设置为 FR-FR 或法语 （法国）。The following example sets the current UI culture to fr-FR or French (France). [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/cs/currentuiculture1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/vb/currentuiculture1.vb#1)] 在多线程应用程序中，您可以显式设置的任何线程 UI 区域性通过将分配对象表示线程的区域性属性。In a multithreaded application, you can explicitly set the UI culture of any thread by assigning a object that represents that culture to the thread's property. 如果线程想要设置其区域性是当前线程，则可以分配到的新区域性属性。If the thread whose culture you want to set is the current thread, you can assign the new culture to the property. 如果显式设置线程的 UI 区域性，线程保留相同的区域性，即使它跨越应用程序域边界，并在另一个应用程序域中执行代码。When the UI culture of a thread is set explicitly, that thread retains the same culture even if it crosses application domain boundaries and executes code in another application domain. ## 隐式设置当前 UI 区域性Implicitly Setting the Current UI Culture 当一个线程，包括主应用程序线程，第一个，默认情况下创建其当前 UI 区域性设置，如下所示：When a thread, including the main application thread, is first created, by default its current UI culture is set as follows: - 通过使用由定义的区域性属性的当前应用程序域的属性值不是如果`null`。By using the culture defined by the property for the current application domain if the property value is not `null`. - 通过使用系统的默认区域性。By using the system's default culture. 在系统上使用 Windows 操作系统的公共语言运行时调用 Windows`GetUserDefaultUILanguage`函数可设置当前 UI 区域性。On systems that use the Windows operating system, the common language runtime calls the Windows `GetUserDefaultUILanguage` function to set the current UI culture. `GetUserDefaultUILanguage` 返回由用户设置的默认 UI 区域性。`GetUserDefaultUILanguage` returns the default UI culture set by the user. 如果用户未设置默认 UI 语言，则返回最初在系统上安装的区域性。If the user has not set a default UI language, it returns the culture originally installed on the system. 如果线程跨越应用程序边界，并在另一个应用程序域中执行代码，其区域性确定的新创建的线程相同的方式。If the thread crosses application boundaries and executes code in another application domain, its culture is determined in the same way as that of a newly created thread. 请注意，如果设置不同于安装了系统的 UI 区域性特定的 UI 区域性或用户的首选的 UI 区域性，并启动应用程序的多个线程，这些线程的当前 UI 区域性返回的区域性`GetUserDefaultUILanguage`函数，除非您为其分配区域性线程执行所在的应用程序域中的属性。Note that if you set a specific UI culture that is different from the system-installed UI culture or the user's preferred UI culture, and your application starts multiple threads, the current UI culture of those threads will be the culture returned by the `GetUserDefaultUILanguage` function, unless you assign a culture to the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 更改当前线程的区域性，需要权限值设置。Changing the culture of the current thread requires a permission with the value set. > [!CAUTION] > 由于与线程关联的安全状态，对线程进行操作很危险。Manipulating threads is dangerous because of the security state associated with threads. 因此，仅对可信的代码，并且仅在必要的时候，则应授予此权限。Therefore, this permission should be given only to trustworthy code, and then only as necessary. 不能更改线程的区域性不完全受信任的代码中。You cannot change thread culture in semi-trusted code. ## 当前 UI 区域性和 UWP 应用The current UI culture and UWP apps 在通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 应用中，属性是读写的就像它是.NET Framework 和.NET Core 应用程序中; 您可以使用它来获取并设置当前区域性。In Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, the property is read-write, just as it is in .NET Framework and .NET Core apps; you can use it both to get and to set the current culture. 但是，UWP 应用不区分当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性。However, UWP apps do not distinguish between the current culture and the current UI culture. 并属性映射到的第一个值[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)集合。The and properties map to the first value in the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) collection. 在.NET Framework 和.NET Core 应用程序，当前 UI 区域性为每个线程设置，和属性反映当前线程的 UI 区域性。In .NET Framework and .NET Core apps, the current UI culture is a per-thread setting, and the property reflects the UI culture of the current thread only. 在 UWP 应用中，当前的区域性将映射到[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)属性，它是一种全局设置。In UWP apps, the current culture maps to the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) property, which is a global setting. 设置属性发生更改的整个应用程序的区域性; 不能针对每个线程设置区域性。Setting the property changes the culture of the entire app; culture cannot be set on a per-thread basis. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改和当前线程。The following code example demonstrates how to change the and of the current thread. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2/CPP/currentculture.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2/CS/currentculture.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture2/VB/currentculture.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## OverridesOverrides 用户可以选择重写一些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分的当前区域性关联的值。The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用一种货币而不是默认区域性。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果是`true`和指定的区域性匹配的 Windows，当前区域性使用这些重写值，其中包括用户设置的属性返回实例属性，和的属性返回实例属性。If is `true` and the specified culture matches the current culture of Windows, the uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the instance returned by the property, and the properties of the instance returned by the property. 如果用户设置与不兼容与关联的区域性，例如，如果在所选的日历不是之一，方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined. 值属性和属性不计算得出，直到你的应用程序访问的属性。The value of the property and the property is not calculated until your application accesses the property. 如果用户可以更改当前区域性为新区域性时运行该应用程序，然后该应用程序访问或属性，应用程序中检索而不是重写的新区域性的默认值原始区域性。If the user can change the current culture to a new culture while the application is running and then the application accesses the or property, the application retrieves the defaults for the new culture instead of the overrides for the original culture. 若要保留原始的当前区域性的重写设置，应用程序应访问和属性，然后才能更改当前区域性。To preserve the overrides for the original current culture, the application should access the and properties before changing the current culture. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 CultureInfo.Clone 还克隆并与关联的实例。The following code example shows that CultureInfo.Clone also clones the and instances associated with the . [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone/CPP/yslin_cultureinfo_clone.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone/CS/yslin_cultureinfo_clone.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone/VB/yslin_cultureinfo_clone.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和早期版本中，默认情况下，所有线程的区域性设置为 Windows 系统区域性。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and previous versions, by default, the culture of all threads is set to the Windows system culture. 对于当前区域性不同于默认系统区域性的应用程序，此行为通常是不可取的。For applications whose current culture differs from the default system culture, this behavior is often undesirable. 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则属性使应用程序能够在应用程序域中定义的所有线程的默认区域性。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the property enables an application to define the default culture of all threads in an application domain. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果未显式设置的区域性的任何现有线程在应用程序域中，设置执行属性也会更改这些线程的区域性。If you have not explicitly set the culture of any existing threads executing in an application domain, setting the property also changes the culture of these threads. 但是，如果在另一个应用程序域中执行这些线程，则其区域性定义由该应用程序域中的属性或如果定义没有默认值，则由默认系统区域性。However, if these threads execute in another application domain, their culture is defined by the property in that application domain or, if no default value is defined, by the default system culture. 因此，我们建议您始终显式设置你的主应用程序线程的区域性，并且不依赖于属性来定义主应用程序线程的区域性。Because of this, we recommend that you always explicitly set the culture of your main application thread, and not rely on the property to define the culture of the main application thread. 除非它已显式设置的值属性是`null`，由默认 Windows 系统区域性定义的应用程序域中线程的未分配显式区域性的区域性。Unless it is set explicitly, the value of the property is `null`, and the culture of threads in an application domain that have not been assigned an explicit culture is defined by the default Windows system culture. 有关区域性、 线程和应用程序域的详细信息，请参阅"区域性和线程"和"区域性和应用程序域"部分中参考页。For more information about cultures, threads, and application domains, see the "Culture and threads" and "Culture and application domains" sections in the reference page. ## Examples 下面的示例说明了在.NET Framework 中定义一个新线程的当前区域性的默认行为。The following example illustrates the default behavior of the .NET Framework in defining the current culture of a new thread. 在启动时，该示例设置当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性为法语 （法国） 除外的默认系统区域性已经是法语 （法国） 的所有系统上。At startup, the example sets the current culture and the current UI culture to French (France) on all systems except those on which the default system culture is already French (France). 如果默认系统区域性已经是法语 （法国），则该代码设置当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性为英语 （美国）。If the default system culture is already French (France), the code sets the current culture and the current UI culture to English (United States). 然后，它调用`DisplayRandomNumbers`例程，它生成三个随机数字，并将它们显示为货币值。It then calls the `DisplayRandomNumbers` routine, which generates three random numbers and displays them as currency values. 接下来，它将创建一个新线程，也会执行`DisplayRandomNumbers`例程。Next, it creates a new thread, which also executes the `DisplayRandomNumbers` routine. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentculture/cs/defaultculture1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentculture/vb/defaultculture1.vb#1)] 如示例输出所示，当系统区域性为英语 （美国） 的计算机上运行该示例的主线程显示其使用法语 （法国） 区域性的格式设置约定的货币值。As the output from the example shows, when the example is run on a computer whose system culture is English (United States), the main thread displays its currency values using the formatting conventions of the French (France) culture. 但是，由于工作线程的区域性派生自当前的 Windows 系统区域而不是应用程序的当前区域性，工作线程显示它使用英语 （美国） 区域性的格式设置约定的货币值。However, because the worker thread's culture is derived from the current Windows system culture rather than the application's current culture, the work thread displays its currency values using the formatting conventions of the English (United States) culture. 下面的示例使用和属性以定义的当前区域性和新的应用程序线程的当前 UI 区域性。The following example uses the and properties to define the current culture and current UI culture of a new application thread. 在启动时，该示例设置当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性为法语 （法国） 除外的默认系统区域性已经是法语 （法国） 的所有系统上。At startup, the example sets the current culture and the current UI culture to French (France) on all systems except those on which the default system culture is already French (France). 如果默认系统区域性已经是法语 （法国），则将当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性设置为英语 （美国）。If the default system culture is already French (France), it sets the current culture and the current UI culture to English (United States). 然后，它调用`DisplayRandomNumbers`例程，它生成三个随机数字，并将它们显示为货币值。It then calls the `DisplayRandomNumbers` routine, which generates three random numbers and displays them as currency values. 接下来，它将创建一个新线程，也会执行`DisplayRandomNumbers`例程。Next, it creates a new thread, which also executes the `DisplayRandomNumbers` routine. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentculture/cs/defaultculture2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentculture/vb/defaultculture2.vb#2)] 如示例输出所示，当系统区域性为英语 （美国） 的计算机上运行该示例的主线程和工作线程都将显示使用法语 （法国） 区域性的格式设置约定及其货币值。As the output from the example shows, when the example is run on a computer whose system culture is English (United States), both the main thread and the worker thread display their currency values using the formatting conventions of the French (France) culture.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前应用程序域中线程的默认 UI 区域性。

span.span: Gets or sets the default UI culture for threads in the current application domain.

value.span: 如果当前系统 UI 区域性为当前应用程序域中的默认线程 UI 区域性，则当前应用程序域中线程的默认 UI 区域性或 。

span.span: The default UI culture for threads in the current application domain, or if the current system UI culture is the default thread UI culture in the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和早期版本中，默认情况下，所有线程的 UI 区域性设置为 Windows 系统区域性。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and previous versions, by default, the UI culture of all threads is set to the Windows system culture. 对于当前 UI 区域性不同于默认系统区域性的应用程序，此行为通常是不可取的。For applications whose current UI culture differs from the default system culture, this behavior is often undesirable. 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则属性，可以在应用程序域中定义的所有线程的默认 UI 区域性。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the property lets you define the default UI culture of all threads in an application domain. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果未显式设置的 UI 区域性的任何现有线程在应用程序域中，设置执行属性也会更改这些线程的区域性。If you have not explicitly set the UI culture of any existing threads executing in an application domain, setting the property also changes the culture of these threads. 但是，如果在另一个应用程序域中执行这些线程，则其区域性定义由该应用程序域中的属性或如果定义没有默认值，则由默认系统区域性。However, if these threads execute in another application domain, their culture is defined by the property in that application domain or, if no default value is defined, by the default system culture. 因此，我们建议始终显式设置主应用程序线程的区域性并不依赖于属性来定义主应用程序线程的区域性。Because of this, we recommend that you always explicitly set the culture of your main application thread and do not rely on the property to define the culture of the main application thread. 除非它已显式设置的值属性是`null`，和应用程序域中所有未分配显式区域性的线程的当前区域性定义的默认 Windows 系统区域性。Unless it is set explicitly, the value of the property is `null`, and the current culture of all threads in an application domain that have not been assigned an explicit culture is defined by the default Windows system culture. 有关区域性、 线程和应用程序域的详细信息，请参阅"区域性和线程"和"区域性和应用程序域"部分中参考页。For more information about cultures, threads, and application domains, see the "Culture and threads" and "Culture and application domains" sections in the reference page. ## Examples 下面的示例说明了在.NET Framework 中定义一个新线程的当前区域性的默认行为。The following example illustrates the default behavior of the .NET Framework in defining the current culture of a new thread. 它使用英语和俄罗斯语语言资源。It uses English and Russian language resources. 名为 GreetingStrings.txt 的以下文本文件包含英语语言资源：The following text file named GreetingStrings.txt contains the English language resources: ``` greeting =Hello again! newGreeting=Hello! ``` 编译为二进制.resources 文件通过使用名为 GreetingStrings.resources[资源文件生成器](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)使用以下命令。It is compiled to a binary .resources file named GreetingStrings.resources by using the [Resource File Generator](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md) with the following command. ```console resgen greetingstrings.txt ``` 名为 GreetingStrings.ru-RU.txt 的以下文本文件包含俄语语言资源：The following text file named GreetingStrings.ru-RU.txt contains the Russian language resources: ``` greeting=Еще раз привет! newGreeting=Привет! ``` 编译为二进制.resources 文件通过使用名为 GreetingStrings.ru RU.resources[资源文件生成器](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)使用以下命令。It is compiled to a binary .resources file named GreetingStrings.ru-RU.resources by using the [Resource File Generator](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md) with the following command. ```console resgen greetingstrings.ru-RU.txt ``` 应用程序代码，如下所示，驻留在文件中名为 Example1.vb 或 Example1.cs。The application code, which is shown below, resides in a file named Example1.vb or Example1.cs. 它被编译为可执行文件的 Visual Basic 编译器使用以下命令：It is compiled to an executable by using the following command for the Visual Basic compiler: ```console vbc Example1.vb /resource:GreetingStrings.resources ``` 对于 C# 编译器，该命令是类似：For the C# compiler, the command is similar: ```console csc /resource:GreetingStrings.resources Example1.cs ``` 这将创建包含示例的可执行代码以及其回退区域性的资源程序集。This creates an assembly that includes the example's executable code along with the resources for its fallback culture. 此外可以使用[程序集链接器](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)创建俄语 （俄罗斯） 区域性的资源文件使用以下命令：You can also use the [Assembly Linker](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) to create the resource file for the Russian (Russia) culture with the following command: ```console >al /embed:greetingstrings.ru-RU.resources /c:ru-RU /template:example1.exe /out:ru-RU\Example1.resources.dll ``` 在启动时，该示例设置当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性为俄语 （俄罗斯） 除外的默认系统区域性已经是俄语的所有系统上 （俄罗斯）。At startup, the example sets the current culture and the current UI culture to Russian (Russia) on all systems except those on which the default system culture is already Russian (Russia). 如果默认系统区域性已经是俄语 （俄罗斯）、 代码集的当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性以英语 （美国）。If the default system culture is already Russian (Russia), the code sets the current culture and the current UI culture to English (United States). 然后，它调用`ShowGreeting`例程，后者将显示在后续方法调用的简单字符串就是第一次和略有不同的字符串。It then calls the `ShowGreeting` routine, which displays a simple string the first time it is called and a slightly different string on subsequent method calls. 接下来，它将创建一个新线程，也会执行`ShowGreeting`例程。Next, it creates a new thread, which also executes the `ShowGreeting` routine. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentuiculture/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentuiculture/vb/example1.vb#1)] 如示例输出所示，当系统区域性为英语 （美国） 的计算机上运行该示例的主线程在俄语中显示其初始字符串。As the output from the example shows, when the example is run on a computer whose system culture is English (United States), the main thread displays its initial string in Russian. 但是，因为工作线程的区域性派生自当前的 Windows 系统区域而不是应用程序的当前区域性，工作线程以英语显示其字符串。However, because the worker thread's culture is derived from the current Windows system culture rather than the application's current culture, the worker thread displays its string in English. 下面的示例使用和属性以定义的当前区域性和新的应用程序线程的当前 UI 区域性。The following example uses the and properties to define the current culture and current UI culture of a new application thread. 该示例与上面的示例使用相同的资源文件。The example uses the same resources files as the previous example. 编译并将本地化的俄语语言资源嵌入到附属程序集的命令也是完全相同，只不过可执行程序集的名称会更改。The commands to compile and to embed the localized Russian language resources into a satellite assembly are also identical, except that the name of the executable assembly changes. 在启动时，该示例设置当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性为俄语 （俄罗斯） 除外的默认系统区域性已经是俄语的所有系统上 （俄罗斯）。At startup, the example sets the current culture and the current UI culture to Russian (Russia) on all systems except those on which the default system culture is already Russian (Russia). 如果已经默认系统区域性是俄语 （俄罗斯），它将设置当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性为英语 （美国）。If the default system culture is already Russian (Russia), it sets the current culture and the current UI culture to English (United States). 然后，它调用`ShowGreeting`例程，后者将显示在后续方法调用的简单字符串就是第一次和略有不同的字符串。It then calls the `ShowGreeting` routine, which displays a simple string the first time it is called and a slightly different string on subsequent method calls. 接下来，它将创建一个新线程，也会执行`ShowGreeting`例程。Next, it creates a new thread, which also executes the `ShowGreeting` routine. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentuiculture/cs/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentuiculture/vb/example2.vb#2)] 如示例输出所示，当系统区域性为英语 （美国） 的计算机上运行该示例的主线程和工作线程以俄语语言显示它们的字符串。As the output from the example shows, when the example is run on a computer whose system culture is English (United States), both the main thread and the worker thread display their strings in the Russian language.
