summary.span: 获取完整的本地化区域性名称。

span.span: Gets the full localized culture name.

value.span: 格式的完整本地化的区域性名称*languagefull* [*country/regionfull*]，其中*languagefull*是语言的完整名称和*country/regionfull*是国家/地区的完整名称。

span.span: The full localized culture name in the format *languagefull* [*country/regionfull*], where *languagefull* is the full name of the language and *country/regionfull* is the full name of the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的本地化的名称对象。This property represents the localized name of the object. 区域性名称可能因脚本编写或格式设置约定。Culture names may vary due to scripting or formatting conventions. 应使用返回的名称进行显示，并尝试对其进行分析。You should use the returned name for display, and not attempt to parse it. 如果通过创建自定义区域性类，属性初始化的值为属性。If a custom culture is created by means of the class, the property is initialized to the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了非特定区域性的多个属性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 此示例分别显示与 0x0004 和 0x7C04 区域性标识符的 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 区域性。The example displays the zh-CHS and zh-CHT cultures with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 但是，Windows Vista 应用程序应使用-Zh-hans 名称而不是 ZH-CHS 和 Zh-hant 名称而不是 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. -Zh-hans 和 Zh-hant 名称表示当前的标准，并且应使用，除非使用较旧名称的理由需要。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CPP/getcultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CS/getcultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/VB/getcultures.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，对于特定的区域性名称 EN-US 是"英语 （美国）"。For example, the for the specific culture name en-US is "English (United States)". 此属性的值是相同的而不考虑.NET Framework 的语言版本。The value of this property is the same, regardless of the language version of the .NET Framework. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了非特定区域性的多个属性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 此示例分别显示的较旧 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 0x0004 和 0x7C04 区域性标识符，使用的区域性名称。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 但是，Windows Vista 应用程序应使用-Zh-hans 名称而不是 ZH-CHS 和 Zh-hant 名称而不是 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. -Zh-hans 和 Zh-hant 名称表示当前的标准，并且应使用，除非使用较旧名称的理由需要。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Globalization.CultureInfo GetConsoleFallbackUICulture() cil managed

summary.span: 如果默认的图形用户界面区域性不合适，则获取适合控制台应用程序的备用用户界面区域性。

span.span: Gets an alternate user interface culture suitable for console applications when the default graphic user interface culture is unsuitable.

returns.span: 用于在控制台上读取和显示文本的备用区域性。

span.span: An alternate culture that is used to read and display text on the console.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 阿拉伯语、 希伯来语、 乌尔都语和叙利亚语等语言基于双向文本。Languages such as Arabic, Hebrew, Urdu, and Syriac are based on bidirectional text. Windows 应用程序，有一个图形用户界面，支持双向语言。Windows applications, which have a graphical user interface, support bidirectional languages. 但是，控制台应用程序，采用操作系统控制台的文本用户界面，不提供的双向支持。However, console applications, which employ the text user interface of the operating system console, do not provide bidirectional support. 因此，如果本地化为阿拉伯语或希伯来语的控制台应用程序，你的应用程序控制台屏幕上显示不可读的文本。Therefore, if you localize a console application to Arabic or Hebrew, your application displays unreadable text on the console screen. 用户界面区域性指定应用程序需要支持用户输入和输出，以及默认情况下与操作系统的系统区域性相同的资源。The user interface culture specifies the resources an application needs to support user input and output, and by default is the same as the operating system culture. 例如，属性返回的阿拉伯语区域性为阿拉伯语操作系统。For example, the property returns an Arabic culture for an Arabic operating system. 使用方法来检索适合控制台应用程序用户界面的区域性。Use the method to retrieve a culture suitable for a console application user interface. 你的应用程序检索备用用户界面区域性后，它应将区域性分配给当前线程的当前用户接口区域性。After your application retrieves the fallback user interface culture, it should assign the culture to the current user interface culture of the current thread. 有关详细信息，请参阅的"显式设置当前 UI 区域性"部分属性。For more information, see the "Explicitly Setting the Current UI Culture" section of the property. 以下是具有从预定义的区域性名称的不同回退用户界面区域性名称的预定义的区域性。The following are predefined cultures that have a different fallback user interface culture name from the predefined culture name. |预定义的区域性Predefined culture|区域性名称Culture name|备用用户界面区域性名称Fallback user interface culture name| remarks.format: ## Remarks 我们建议使用此方法的字符串重载 ()，因为区域设置名称应使用而不是 lcid 的数量。We recommend that you use the string overload of this method (), because locale names should be used instead of LCIDs. 对于自定义区域设置，区域设置名称为必需。For custom locales, the locale name is required. 如果`culture`是为当前区域性，返回的区域设置标识符对象不会反映任何用户重写。If `culture` is the locale identifier of the current culture, the returned object does not reflect any user overrides.

span.para: [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]和早期版本抛如果不是有效的区域性标识符。从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，此方法将引发。下运行的应用程序起[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]或更高版本 Windows 7 或更高版本，该方法尝试检索对象，其标识符为从操作系统; 如果操作系统不支持该区域性方法会抛出。

The [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions throw an if is not a valid culture identifier. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this method throws a . Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a object whose identifier is from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, the method throws a .

summary.span: 使用特定的区域性名称检索某个区域性的缓存的只读实例。

span.span: Retrieves a cached, read-only instance of a culture using the specified culture name.
A read-only object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预定义的区域性名称的列表，请参阅[国家/地区语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在访问全球开发人员中心。For a list of predefined culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，从 Windows 10 开始`name`可以是任何有效的 BCP-47 语言标记。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 方法检索缓存，只读对象。The method retrieves a cached, read-only object. 它提供更好的性能比相应地调用构造函数。It offers better performance than a corresponding call to the constructor. 如果`name`的当前区域性，返回名称对象不会反映任何用户重写。If `name` is the name of the current culture, the returned object does not reflect any user overrides. 这使该方法适用于服务器应用程序或工具没有在系统上的实际用户帐户且需要有效地加载多个区域性。This makes the method suitable for server applications or tools that do not have a real user account on the system and that need to load multiple cultures efficiently. 如果`name`是，该方法将返回固定区域性。If `name` is , the method returns the invariant culture. 这相当于检索的值属性。This is equivalent to retrieving the value of the property.

exception.span: 为 null。

span.span: is null.

exception.span: 指定不支持的区域性。

exception.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅“调用方备注”部分。

span.para: [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]和早期版本抛如果不是有效的区域性名称。从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，此方法将引发。下运行的应用程序起[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]或更高版本 Windows 7 或更高版本，该方法尝试检索对象，其标识符为从操作系统; 如果操作系统不支持该区域性，并且不是补充或替换的区域性，该方法将引发名称。

The [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions throw an if is not a valid culture name. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this method throws a . Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a object whose identifier is from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, and if is not the name of a supplementary or replacement culture, the method throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预定义的区域性名称的列表，请参阅[国家/地区语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在访问全球开发人员中心。For a list of predefined culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，从 Windows 10 开始`name`可以是任何有效的 BCP-47 语言标记。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 方法获取缓存，只读对象。The method obtains a cached, read-only object. 它提供更好的性能比相应地调用构造函数。It offers better performance than a corresponding call to a constructor. 该方法用于创建类似于指定的区域性`name`参数，但具有不同的排序和大小写规则。The method is used to create a culture similar to that specified by the `name` parameter, but with different sorting and casing rules. 如果`name`或`altName`是名称的当前区域性，返回的对象不能反映任何用户重写。If `name` or `altName` is the name of the current culture, the returned objects do not reflect any user overrides. 如果`name`是，该方法将返回固定区域性。If `name` is , the method returns the invariant culture. 这相当于检索的值属性。This is equivalent to retrieving the value of the property. 如果`altName`是，该方法使用的书写体系和比较指定固定区域性的规则。If `altName` is , the method uses the writing system and comparison rules specified by the invariant culture.

span.para: [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]和早期版本抛如果或不是有效的区域性名称。从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，此方法将引发。下运行的应用程序起[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]或更高版本 Windows 7 或更高版本，该方法尝试检索对象，其标识符为从操作系统; 如果操作系统不支持该区域性，并且不是补充或替换的区域性，该方法将引发名称异常。下运行的应用程序起[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]或更高版本 Windows 7 或更高版本，该方法尝试检索对象，其标识符为从操作系统; 如果操作系统不支持该区域性，并且不是补充或替换的区域性，该方法将引发名称异常。

The [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions throw an if or is not a valid culture name. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this method throws a . Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a object whose identifier is from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, and if is not the name of a supplementary or replacement culture, the method throws a exception. Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a object whose identifier is from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, and if is not the name of a supplementary or replacement culture, the method throws a exception.

param.name: name
param.span: 按 RFC 4646 标准指定的语言的名称。

summary.span: 已否决。

span.span: Deprecated.

summary.span: 检索只读的 对象，其语言特征由指定的 RFC 4646 语言标记标识。

span.span: Retrieves a read-only object having linguistic characteristics that are identified by the specified RFC 4646 language tag.
A read-only object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法和属性已弃用。This method and the property are deprecated. 而不是使用这些元素，该应用程序应使用的新对象并调用到属性。Instead of using these elements, the application should use a new object and calls to the property. IETF 标记和名称是相同的。IETF tags and names are identical. 维护 Internet 工程任务组 (IETF) 的 RFC 4646 标准定义一个 IETF 语言标记，提供了统一的方法来确定一种语言。The RFC 4646 standard that is maintained by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) defines an IETF language tag, which provides a uniform means of identifying a language. 一个 IETF 语言标记的格式是返回的区域性名称相同属性，但不唯一地标识一个区域性。The format of an IETF language tag is the same as the culture name returned by the property, but does not identify a culture uniquely. 如果这些区域性具有相同的语言特征，不同的区域性将共享同一个 IETF 语言标记。Different cultures share the same IETF language tag if those cultures have identical linguistic characteristics. 中包含一个区域性的语言特征对象与关联对象。The linguistic characteristics of a culture are contained in the object associated with a object. 一个 IETF 语言标记组成是必需的语言标识符、 可选脚本标识符和可选区域标识符。An IETF language tag consists of a mandatory language identifier, an optional script identifier, and an optional region identifier. 你的应用程序应使用检索到的区域性来控制特定于语言的任务，例如管理拼写或语法检查器。Your applications should use the retrieved culture to control language-specific tasks, such as managing a spelling or grammar checker. 应用程序不应使用检索到的区域性以控制特定于区域性的任务，例如文本进行排序或格式化时间和日期。Applications should not use the retrieved culture to control culture-specific tasks, such as sorting text or formatting times and dates. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 4646、"标记为标识语言"和最新草案标准、 草稿-phillips-langtags-05.txt，在[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100231 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100231)。For more information, see RFC 4646, "Tags for Identifying Languages," and the most recent draft standard, Draft-phillips-langtags-05.txt, at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100231](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100231).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常与调用方法`types`参数设置为以下值：The method is most commonly called with the `types` parameter set to the following values: - 表示返回所有特定区域性。, which returns all specific cultures. - 表示返回所有非特定区域性和固定区域性。, which returns all neutral cultures and the invariant culture. - 表示返回所有非特定和特定区域性、 Windows 系统中安装的区域性和由用户创建的自定义区域性。, which returns all neutral and specific cultures, cultures installed in the Windows system, and custom cultures created by the user. - 表示返回所有自定义区域性，例如那些由注册类。, which returns all custom cultures, such as those registered by the class. 在 Windows 10 之前的 Windows 版本值适用于所有用户定义的自定义区域性。In versions of Windows before Windows 10, the value applies to all user-defined custom cultures. 从 Windows 10 开始，它适用于系统区域性缺少完整的文化数据并不具有唯一本地标识符，由属性值。Starting with Windows 10, it applies to system cultures that lack complete cultural data and that do not have a unique local identifier, as indicated by the property value. 因此，如下所示的代码将返回不同的结果时在 Windows 10 和 Windows 的早期版本上运行。As a result, code such as the following will return different results when run on Windows 10 and on an earlier version of Windows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CS/getcultures3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/VB/getcultures3.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了非特定区域性的多个属性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 此示例分别显示与 0x0004 和 0x7C04 区域性标识符的 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 区域性。The example displays the zh-CHS and zh-CHT cultures with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 但是，Windows Vista 应用程序应使用-Zh-hans 名称而不是 ZH-CHS 和 Zh-hant 名称而不是 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. -Zh-hans 和 Zh-hant 名称表示当前的标准，并且应使用，除非使用较旧名称的理由需要。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CPP/getcultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CS/getcultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/VB/getcultures.vb#1)]

span.span: A string that is the RFC 4646 standard identification for a language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此属性和方法已弃用。This property and the method are deprecated. 相反，应使用属性。Instead, you should use a the property. IETF 标记和名称是相同的。IETF tags and names are identical. 维护 Internet 工程任务组 (IETF) 的 RFC 4646 标准定义一个 IETF 语言标记，提供了统一的方法来确定一种语言。The RFC 4646 standard that is maintained by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) defines an IETF language tag, which provides a uniform means of identifying a language. 一个 IETF 语言标记的格式是类似于返回的区域性名称属性，但不唯一地标识一个区域性。The format of an IETF language tag is similar to the culture name returned by the property, but does not identify a culture uniquely. 也就是说，不同的区域性共享同一个 IETF 语言标记，如果这些区域性具有相同的语言特征。That is, different cultures share the same IETF language tag if those cultures have identical linguistic characteristics. 中包含一个区域性的语言特征对象与关联对象。The linguistic characteristics of a culture are contained in the object associated with a object. 一个 IETF 语言标记组成是必需的语言标识符、 可选脚本标识符和可选区域标识符。An IETF language tag consists of a mandatory language identifier, an optional script identifier, and an optional region identifier. 有关详细信息，请参阅[RFC 5646"标记为标识语言](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=230876)。For more information, see [RFC 5646, "Tags for Identifying Languages](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=230876). 子标记的列表，请参阅[IANA 语言子标记注册表](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=230877)。For a list of subtags, see [The IANA Language Subtag Registry](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=230877).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在已本地化的操作系统，如日语版本的 Windows，此属性返回的操作系统的区域性。In a localized operating system, such as a Japanese edition of Windows, this property returns the culture of the operating system. 此属性等效于`GetSystemDefaultUILanguage`Windows API 中。This property is the equivalent of `GetSystemDefaultUILanguage` in the Windows API.

summary.span: 获取不依赖于区域性（固定）的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is culture-independent (invariant).

value.span: 不依赖于区域性（固定）的对象。

span.span: The object that is culture-independent (invariant).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 固定区域性不区分区域性;它是关联与英语语言，但不能与任何国家/地区。The invariant culture is culture-insensitive; it is associated with the English language but not with any country/region. 固定区域性按名称指定通过使用空字符串 ("") 对的调用中实例化方法。You specify the invariant culture by name by using an empty string ("") in the call to a instantiation method. 此外将检索固定区域性的实例。 also retrieves an instance of the invariant culture. 它可以在几乎所有方法中使用要求区域性的命名空间。It can be used in almost any method in the namespace that requires a culture. 如返回属性的对象， ，和还反映字符串比较和格式设置的固定区域性的约定。The objects returned by properties such as , , and also reflect the string comparison and formatting conventions of the invariant culture. 与不同的是区分区域性的数据，可能会发生更改的用户自定义或对.NET Framework 或操作系统的更新，固定区域性稳定时间和已安装的区域性特定和数据不能由用户自定义。Unlike culture-sensitive data, which is subject to change by user customization or by updates to the .NET Framework or the operating system, invariant culture data is stable over time and across installed cultures and cannot be customized by users. 这样，固定区域性特别有用的操作，需要依赖于区域性的结果，如格式设置和分析操作保留格式的数据，或排序和排序操作需要的数据显示在无论区域性固定的顺序。This makes the invariant culture particularly useful for operations that require culture-independent results, such as formatting and parsing operations that persist formatted data, or sorting and ordering operations that require that data be displayed in a fixed order regardless of culture. ## 字符串操作String Operations 为区分区域性的字符串操作不受当前线程区域性的约定和的上都是一致的区域性，可以使用固定区域性。You can use the invariant culture for culture-sensitive string operations that are not affected by the conventions of the current thread culture and that are consistent across cultures. 例如，可能想要按固定顺序或适用于不考虑当前线程区域性的字符串的一组标准的大小写约定的已排序的数据。For example, you may want sorted data to appear in a fixed order or apply a standard set of casing conventions to strings regardless of the current thread culture. 若要执行此操作，可以传递对象具有方法参数，如和。To do this, you pass the object to a method that has a parameter, such as and . ## 保存数据Persisting Data 属性可用于将数据保存在独立于区域性的格式。The property can be used to persist data in a culture-independent format. 这提供了已知的格式不会更改，可用来序列化和反序列化各个区域性的数据。This provides a known format that does not change and that can be used to serialize and deserialize data across cultures. 反序列化数据后，它可以适当地根据当前用户的区域性约定进行格式化。After the data is deserialized, it can be formatted appropriately based on the cultural conventions of the current user. 例如，如果您选择保留以字符串形式的日期和时间数据，则可以传递对象传递给或方法来创建字符串，并且您可以将传递对象传递给或将字符串转换回为日期和时间值的方法。For example, if you choose to persist date and time data in string form, you can pass the object to the or method to create the string, and you can pass the object to the or method to convert the string back to a date and time value. 此方法可确保基础的日期和时间值不会更改时读取或写入来自不同的区域性的用户数据。This technique ensures that the underlying date and time values do not change when the data is read or written by users from different cultures. 下面的示例使用固定区域性来持久保存以字符串形式的值。The following example uses the invariant culture to persist a value as a string. 然后，分析字符串，并使用法语 （法国） 和德语 （德国） 区域性的格式设置约定来显示其值。It then parses the string and displays its value by using the formatting conventions of the French (France) and German (Germany) cultures. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.invariantculture/cs/persist1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.invariantculture/vb/persist1.vb#1)] ## 安全决策Security Decisions 如果您要做 （如是否允许对系统资源的访问） 的安全决策基于字符串比较或大小写更改的结果，您不应使用固定区域性。If you are making a security decision (such as whether to allow access to a system resource) based on the result of a string comparison or a case change, you should not use the invariant culture. 相反，应通过调用包含的方法来执行区分大小写或不区分大小写的序号比较参数并提供任一或作为自变量。Instead, you should perform a case-sensitive or case-insensitive ordinal comparison by calling a method that includes a parameter and supplying either or as an argument. 如果更改当前区域性或运行代码的计算机上的区域性与可用来测试代码的区域性，则执行区分区域性的字符串操作的代码可能导致安全漏洞。Code that performs culture-sensitive string operations can cause security vulnerabilities if the current culture is changed or if the culture on the computer that is running the code differs from the culture that is used to test the code. 与此相反，序号比较仅取决于比较的字符的二进制值。In contrast, an ordinal comparison depends solely on the binary value of the compared characters.

value.span: 如果当前 表示非特定区域性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current represents a neutral culture; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非特定区域性是关联的区域性与一种语言，但不是与任何国家/地区 / 区域。A neutral culture is a culture that is associated with a language but not with a country or region. 它不同于特定区域性，它是一种语言和国家/地区或区域与关联的区域性。It differs from a specific culture, which is a culture that is associated with both a language and a country or region. 例如，fr 是法语区域性非特定语言的名称，而-FR 是法国法语区域性的名称。For example, fr is the name for the neutral French culture, while fr-FR is the name for the French culture in France. 如果此属性返回`false`，区域性是特定区域性或固定区域性。If this property returns `false`, the culture is either a specific culture or the invariant culture. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定哪些使用简体中文的语言的区域性非特定区域性。The following code example determines which cultures using the Chinese language are neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 此示例分别显示的较旧 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 0x0004 和 0x7C04 区域性标识符，使用的区域性名称。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 但是，Windows Vista 应用程序应使用-Zh-hans 名称而不是 ZH-CHS 和 Zh-hant 名称而不是 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. -Zh-hans 和 Zh-hant 名称表示当前的标准，并且应使用，除非使用较旧名称的理由需要。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture2/CPP/neutralculture.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture2/CS/neutralculture.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture2/VB/neutralculture.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入法区域设置标识符以前称为键盘布局。The input locale identifier was formerly called the keyboard layout. 输入法区域设置标识符是输入的更广泛概念，而不是键盘布局，因为它还可以指示语音到文本转换器、 输入法编辑器 (IME) 或任何其他形式。An input locale identifier is a broader concept than a keyboard layout since it can also indicate a speech-to-text converter, an Input Method Editor (IME), or any other form of input.

summary.span: 获取当前 的区域性标识符。

span.span: Gets the culture identifier for the current .

value.span: 当前 的区域性标识符。

span.span: The culture identifier for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下，区域性标识符映射到相应的 NLS 区域设置标识符。In most cases, the culture identifier is mapped to the corresponding NLS locale identifier. 在 Windows 10 中，区域设置标识符之前的 Windows 版本中`LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED`（0x1000 控制或 4096） 分配给由用户创建的自定义区域性。In versions of Windows prior to Windows 10, the locale identifier `LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED` (0x1000, or 4096) is assigned to custom cultures created by the user. 从 Windows 10 开始，它被分配给任何区域性不具有唯一的区域设置标识符并不具有完整的系统提供数据。Starting with Windows 10, it is assigned to any culture that does not have a unique locale identifier and does not have complete system-provided data. 因此，用于循环访问的区域性和检索那些具有代码的值`LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED`返回的更大子集对象; 如果在 Windows 10 下运行。As a result, code that iterates cultures and retrieves those with an value of `LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED` returns a larger subset of objects if run under Windows 10. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建西班牙语 （西班牙） 与国际排序顺序，另一个与传统的排序顺序。The following code example shows how to create a for Spanish (Spain) with the international sort order and another with the traditional sort order. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo_esES#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo_esES/CPP/spanishspain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo_esES#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo_esES/CS/spanishspain.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo_esES#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo_esES/VB/spanishspain.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关预定义的区域性名称和标识符的列表，属性可返回，请参阅[国家/地区语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在访问全球开发人员中心。For a list of predefined culture names and identifiers that the property can return, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，从 Windows 10 开始`name`可以是任何有效的 BCP-47 语言标记。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 请注意区域性名称发生更改，并且它们还可以反映自定义区域性的名称。Note that culture names are subject to change, and that they also can reflect the names of custom cultures. 属性遵循命名标准中提供类主题。The property follows the naming standards provided in the class topic. 它将返回不包括任何可能的备选排序顺序的区域性名称的缩写形式。It returns the short form of the culture name that excludes any indication of an alternate sort order. 例如，如果您实例化对象使用字符串"de DE_phoneb"以反映备用排序顺序，属性将返回"DE-DE"。For example, if you instantiate a object by using the string "de-DE_phoneb" to reflect an alternate sort order, the property returns "de-DE". 若要获取区域性的完整名称，应使用， ，或属性。To get the full name of the culture, you should use the , , or property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了非特定区域性的多个属性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 此示例分别显示的较旧 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 0x0004 和 0x7C04 区域性标识符，使用的区域性名称。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 但是，Windows Vista 应用程序应使用-Zh-hans 名称而不是 ZH-CHS 和 Zh-hant 名称而不是 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. -Zh-hans 和 Zh-hant 名称表示当前的标准，并且应使用，除非使用较旧名称的理由需要。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CPP/getcultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CS/getcultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/VB/getcultures.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## OverridesOverrides 用户可以选择重写一些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分的当前区域性关联的值。The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用一种货币而不是默认区域性。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果是`true`和指定的区域性匹配的 Windows，当前区域性使用这些重写值，其中包括用户设置的属性返回实例属性，和的属性返回实例属性。If is `true` and the specified culture matches the current culture of Windows, the uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the instance returned by the property, and the properties of the instance returned by the property. 如果用户设置与不兼容与关联的区域性，例如，如果在所选的日历不是之一，方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined. 值属性和之前用户可以访问该属性不会计算属性。The values of the property and the property are not calculated until the user accesses the property. 如果用户使用控制面板来运行，然后访问该应用程序时，将当前区域性更改为新区域性或属性，该应用程序检索新区域性的默认值。If the user uses the Control Panel to change the current culture to a new culture while the application is running and then accesses the or property, the application retrieves the defaults for the new culture. 不重写原始区域性。not the overrides for the original culture. 若要保留原始的当前区域性的重写设置，应用程序应访问和属性，然后才能更改当前区域性。To preserve the overrides for the original current culture, the application should access the and properties before changing the current culture. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 CultureInfo.Clone 还克隆并与关联的实例。The following code example shows that CultureInfo.Clone also clones the and instances associated with the . [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone/CPP/yslin_cultureinfo_clone.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone/CS/yslin_cultureinfo_clone.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Clone/VB/yslin_cultureinfo_clone.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域性具有层次结构中的特定区域性的父是非特定区域性，是一个非特定区域性的父，和的父为固定区域性本身。The cultures have a hierarchy in which the parent of a specific culture is a neutral culture, the parent of a neutral culture is the , and the parent of the is the invariant culture itself. 父区域性包含仅的信息所共有及其子级集。The parent culture encompasses only the set of information that is common among its children. 如果为特定区域性资源不可用在系统中，使用非特定区域性的资源。If the resources for the specific culture are not available in the system, the resources for the neutral culture are used. 如果非特定区域性资源不可用，则使用嵌入在主程序集中的资源。If the resources for the neutral culture are not available, the resources embedded in the main assembly are used. 资源回退进程的详细信息，请参阅[打包和部署资源](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)。For more information on the resource fallback process, see [Packaging and Deploying Resources](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定使用中文语言每个特定区域性的父区域性。The following code example determines the parent culture of each specific culture using the Chinese language. > [!NOTE] > 此示例分别显示的较旧 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 0x0004 和 0x7C04 区域性标识符，使用的区域性名称。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 但是，Windows Vista 应用程序应使用-Zh-hans 名称而不是 ZH-CHS 和 Zh-hant 名称而不是 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. -Zh-hans 和 Zh-hant 名称表示当前的标准，并且应使用，除非使用较旧名称的理由需要。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent/CPP/parentculture.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent/CS/parentculture.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent/VB/parentculture.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以选择重写一些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分的当前区域性关联的值。The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用一种货币而不是默认区域性。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果是`true`和指定的区域性匹配的 Windows，当前区域性使用这些重写值，其中包括用户设置的属性返回实例属性，和的属性返回实例属性。If is `true` and the specified culture matches the current culture of Windows, the uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the instance returned by the property, and the properties of the instance returned by the property. 如果用户设置与不兼容与关联的区域性，例如，如果在所选的日历不是之一，方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined. 当设置此属性创建。This property is set when the is created.
